trans-unit.source: Setting up a DSC pull client
trans-unit.target: 設定 DSC 提取用戶端

trans-unit.source: Setting up a DSC pull client
trans-unit.target: 設定 DSC 提取用戶端

trans-unit.source: Applies To: Windows PowerShell 4.0, Windows PowerShell 5.0
Each target node has to be told to use pull mode and given the URL or file location where it can contact the pull server to get configurations and resources, and where it should send report data.
trans-unit.target: 必須告知每個目標節點使用提取模式和指定的 URL 或檔案位置，它可從中連絡提取伺服器以取得設定和資源，以及傳送報表資料。

trans-unit.source: The following topics explain how to set up pull clients:
trans-unit.target: 下列主題說明如何設定提取用戶端：

trans-unit.source: Setting up a pull client using configuration names
trans-unit.target: 使用設定名稱設定提取用戶端

trans-unit.source: Setting up a pull client using configuration ID
trans-unit.target: 使用設定識別碼設定提取用戶端

trans-unit.source: To set up a pull client in PowerShell 4.0, see [Setting up a pull client using configuration ID in PowerShell 4.0](pullClientConfigID4.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要設定 PowerShell 4.0 中的提取用戶端，請參閱[使用 PowerShell 4.0 中的設定識別碼設定提取用戶端](pullClientConfigID4.md)。
